name: Second Dog War - Beta Release
description:
You're a Canadian dog who has just joined the war as it comes closer to an end. After your training, you've been assigned to the Normandy Landings, yours being at Juno Beach. You've got to fight and dodge your way through to take the bunkers and help your squad make it out. Good luck.

***THIS GAME IS IN BETA. IT IS SHORT, HAS NO AUDIO, AND A FULL RELEASE IS TO COME IN THE COMING WEEKS***
